name: plack-pwa-api
description: The Plack API Backend for the PWA Application running on a Twiggy Web Server

scripts.build: mkdir -p ~/bin && curl -L https://cpanmin.us/ -o ~/bin/cpanm && chmod +x ~/bin/cpanm && cpanm --local-lib=~/perl5 local::lib ; eval $(perl -I ~/perl5/lib/perl5/ -Mlocal::lib) && cpanm -vn --installdeps .
